Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using the HEK293 cell line.

Readout description.Result Description: Protein expression was reduced by 50% for the variant NM_000345.3:c.248G>A.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression greater than 80% on day 7.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression less than 50% on day 7.

Material used.Description: Immunofluorescence was performed on fibroblasts derived from PD patients.

Readout description.Result Description: α-synuclein aggregation increased by 60% in fibroblasts with the variant NM_000345.3:c.248G>A.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in duplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type fibroblasts were used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Fibroblasts from healthy controls were used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: t-test was used for statistical analysis.

Material used.Description: Behavioral assays were conducted on Drosophila melanogaster expressing the variant.

Readout description.Result Description: Locomotor activity decreased by 40% in Drosophila expressing the variant NM_000345.3:c.248G>A.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type flies were used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Flies overexpressing wild-type α-synuclein were used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Kruskal-Wallis test was used for statistical analysis.
